name: Dinosaur Hunt Survival
description:
New free survival 2017 game! Dinosaur hunting on island - survive now!

You get trapped on a island again... But you already have survival skills!
Big islands in deep ocean have a secret... Discover all the secrets of this islands and survive in tropical forest. But you must beware of predators and different dinosaurs!

Collect items, get different resources, cut down palms, build own house in new survival game.

Game features - Dinosaur Hunt Survival:
- new survival game!
- big 5 islands!
- new adventures!
- absolutely open world!
- build, hunt, craft!
- dynamic day and night changes!
- updated user interface in game!

Be a ready for new adventures!
